opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Aetna Health Inc., Fka Aetna U. S. Healthcare Inc. v. Davila

opinion:
540 U.S. 981

AETNA HEALTH INC., FKA AETNA U. S. HEALTHCARE INC. ET AL.
v.
DAVILA.

No. 02-1845.

Supreme Court of United States.

November 3, 2003.

1

Appeal from the C. A. 5th Cir.

2

Motion of American Association of Health Care Plans, Inc., et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Certiorari granted, cases consolidated, and a total of one hour allotted for oral argument. Reported below: 307 F. 3d 298.
